<final_answer>
The tasks have been completed successfully:

1. The registration details for the CS conference were accessed, and the transaction of $150.00 was sent to the account SE5902959058 for the registration fee.
2. A calendar event titled "CS Conference 2025" has been set up from June 15 to June 17, 2025, at the Tech Convention Center, Silicon Valley. The event details have been emailed to emma.johnson@bluesparrowtech.com.

Everything is now aligned for the conference. If there's anything else you need, feel free to let me know!
</final_answer>
